sense.def: Alternative Names tong xie 瞳斜 , slanted pupil. Illness Sign where one eye is capable of seeing straight ahead while the pupil of the second eye is directed sideward. Pu ji fang 普濟方 364: 夫目偏視者，皆由心肝臟風邪所攻，瞳人 不正，顧視常偏 , “When the eyes look sideward, this is always caused by wind evil affecting the heart and liver depots. [As a result] the pupil assumes an incorrect position and [patients] continuously look towards one side”.
